channel.title: Clients / Friends of Krause Studio
channel.description: Krause Studio will showcase each case they've developed, designed, creatively directed, etc. Please subscripe to the channel to keep up to date with new showcased projects, and stay ajour in the graphic design and web development industry.

item.title: Krause Studio's Client & Friend → C 014 / Point of You
item.description: About Krause Studio's friend → Point of You is all about seeing everything from their client's perspective, therefore the name. Point of You is sharing their knowledge and skillset to grow other companies. Learn how Asger Krause designed and developed their webpage, and corporate visual identity.

item.title: Krause Studio's Client & Friend → C 011 / Krause Studio
item.description: About Krause Studio's friend → Krause Studio is a one man army, multidisciplinary direction + design studio, run by Asger Krause. Their main focus is to help their clients/friends achieve what they would actually be capable of if their visual expression, and visual heritage, was executed properly.

item.title: Krause Studio's Client & Friend → C 013 / Upscaled
item.description: About Krause Studio's friend → A startup company who's fighting amongst the most high-level brands and influencers around the world, striving to automate the growth of world class influencer's reach, personal growth and earnings.

item.title: Krause Studio's Client & Friend → C 012 / Olioli Poké
item.description: About Krause Studio's friend → "Olioli" means "joy" in Hawaiian. Joy is also a keyword and -factor in their concept and growth strategy. Their goal is that the experience of Olioli will create immediate joy for the visitors/customers/guests.

item.title: Krause Studio's Client & Friend → C 009 / Flip Flip Flip
item.description: About Krause Studio's friend → The Danish art photographer Flip shoots photos of all around the world, with a deep focus on catching all surrounding colourful place in one photo.

item.title: Krause Studio's Client & Friend → C 008 / JOE & THE JUICE
item.description: About Krause Studio's friend → Discover and learn how Krause Studio perceives the company, fresh-made juicebar, restaurant and culture/lifestyle brand called JOE & THE JUICE.
